A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Rian Johnson did take risks but most fell flat with little substance sustaining them.  This whole movie placates a myriad of social justice groups\, and it doesn't even do it very well.  It reinforces a female agenda by making every male in the movie look incompetent\, foolish\, and dumb.  \nIt deconstructs beloved heroes for no apparent reason.  It pokes fun at and marginalizes a passionate fan base in an arrogant attempt  to pretend it is progressive\, current \, and smart.
